QuestData.Title: The Day that Deathwing Came
QuestData.Description: Deathwing made quite a mess when he passed through these parts. If it weren't for me, he'd probably still be here, layin' waste to all the good people of the Badlands.$b$bWhat, you don't believe me? Fine, let me tell you the whole story.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you going to listen or not?
QuestData.RewardText: Some story, huh? Now you know why Deathwing hasn't come back here since.
